reviewText: It makes me sick that the Discovery Channel canceled this show. Many of the shows they air now are not worth watching. Out of all the survival shows out there (and there are a lot), this show and Survivorman with Les Stroud are the best, bar none!
Most of the disc have problems where you can't finish watching a disc.  but again I'm not sending the back but YOU have a problem.
My 11 yr.old granddaughter loves these 2 seasons of Man Women Wild - she and her friends watch them over and over again. She takes them with her when she goes on sleepovers !!!!!
Absolutely love this show.  Sure wish Mykel and Ruth would do another season.
Love these shows.  I really wish they had continued making them.
Loved this show and the DVD was great!
For some reason i just really enjoy this show... Im not a camper or anything... but its good knowledge and i really have learned so much .. will get many hours out of these dvds!!
It was good,but the first season was better.

Not quite as clean as season 1.  Many four letter words and some sexual innuendo.  Ruth is trying to portray a sexier role. (I liked down-to-earth, non pretentious Ruth better)  I did not appreciate this.  She conveniently lets her shirt come down on off her shoulder and ties her bra to the top of a make shift shelter.  Ruth is also a little bit crabbier in this season.
Great show, its one of the few survival shows my wife will watch with me. This show and ALONE on History Channel.
I love this show,I wish there were more seasons

Mykel Hawk who is a retired Green Beret and survival expert brings his wife along for these survival  adventures in order to teach her how to survive. His wife is a very beautiful, girlie and feminine English woman who at first struggles to perform the techniques but with every episode her skills get better and better. By watching her who is a raw beginner learn survival techniques a person who doesn`t know how to survive can learn many real world and proven techniques that they can practice and use right away. Techniques that could save their life one day. The show is also extremely entertaining and fun to watch and highly recommended for all fans of survival shows and for people who want to learn how to survival.
